front.title: IS-IS Extension to Support Segment Routing over IPv6 Dataplane

abstract.t: The Segment Routing (SR) allows for a flexible definition of end-to- end paths by encoding paths as sequences of topological sub-paths, called "segments". Segment routing architecture can be implemented over an MPLS data plane as well as an IPv6 data plane. This document describes the IS-IS extensions required to support Segment Routing over an IPv6 data plane. This documents updates [RFC7370] by modifying an existing registry.
